comments.body: Why is the noqa needed here?

df is not defined. In a subsequent line they just load a presaved pgn file. I had a discussion with @datapythonista on this [here](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/issues/24260#issuecomment-446985251)

I think the other alternative is to create `df`, but it may be tricky to make the data match the plot saved in the image, and this is the release notes of pandas 0.7, so wouldn't spend much time on that.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +24,28 @@
   from pandas.tools.plotting import scatter_matrix
   scatter_matrix(df, alpha=0.2)        # noqa F821

.. image:: ../savefig/scatter_matrix_kde.png
